meanings.definition: Of or relating to a sound system that uses four separate channels to create a more immersive audio experience.
meanings.sent1: The quadriphonic speakers in the room filled the space with rich, surround sound.
meanings.sent2: The concert hall was equipped with a quadriphonic system for optimal audio distribution.
meanings.sent3: The quadriphonic setup made it feel like the music was coming from all directions at once!
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed through the quadriphonic room, enveloping everyone in its warmth.
meanings.sent5: The quadriphonic sound enveloped the listeners, transporting them to the heart of the music.

meanings.definition: A quadraphonic sound system or recording.
meanings.sent1: He set up the quadriphonic in his living room to enjoy movies with enhanced audio.
meanings.sent2: The music producer used a quadriphonic to mix the tracks for a more dynamic sound.
meanings.sent3: The quadriphonic hummed happily as it played the latest hit songs.
meanings.sent4: The quadriphonic whispered secrets of the music industry to those who listened closely.
meanings.sent5: The quadriphonic transformed the room into a symphony of sound, captivating all who entered.
